text: Ntenga ﷺ jwaakunsoomela ma Aya ga Allah gakusalichisya, kuti wakoposye awala waakulupilile ni kutendaga yambone kutyochela m’chipi ni kwajinjisya mwilanguka. Sano jwatankulupilile Allah ni kutendaga yambone takan'jinjisye ku Matimbe ga ku Mbepo gasikujilima cha pasi pakwe sulo, chakawe wandamo mwalakwemo kwa yaka ni yaka, Allah pamasile pankolochesye jwalakwejo lisiki lyambone nnope
